From: Gerwin Klein <gerwin.klein@nicta.com.au>
We're pleased to announce the availability of another new entry in the AFP:

LightweightJava by Rok Strni≈°a and Matthew Parkinson

Abstract:
A fully-formalized and extensible minimal imperative fragment of Java.

Cheers,
Gerwin
